page.title: 07DAVIOT PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: Our school is a one teacher school and there are 16 pupils in 1985--5 boys and 11 girls. The school building will be at least 100 years old,but there is a modern temporary classroom too.The old building has a general purposes room and a canteen. School starts at 9.15 a.m. and finishes at 3.30 p.m.We have 1 hour at lunchtime/Our favourite games are Mars,Tig and football.We have a 5-a-sidefootball team.At P.E. we have athletics,badminton,soft ball tennis and cricket,gymnastics and swimming. We go swimming at the Inverness Swimming Pool once a week in the summer term. The play ground in school is very hilly and it is covered in grass.
